attributes.action: Say No! to a two tier state pension. The new state pension for all pensioners!
attributes.background: The Government is about to introduce a new state pension which discriminates against anybody born before 6th April 1951. This means that anyone who has contributed the maximum in National Insurance will get £155.65 per week compared to £119.14 per week if born before 6th April 1951. Clearly unfair!
